channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- FormFlow: WhatsApp Social and Advanced Form Builder with Easy Lead Collection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- FormFlow: WhatsApp Social and Advanced Form Builder with Easy Lead Collection

item.title: CVE-2024-3113|2024-07-30T14:01:38.877Z -- unknown -- formflow%3A%20whatsapp%20social%20and%20advanced%20form%20builder%20with%20easy%20lead%20collection
item.description: The FormFlow: WhatsApp Social and Advanced Form Builder with Easy Lead Collection WordPress plugin before 2.12.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-3113|2024-07-30T06:00:06.437Z -- unknown -- formflow%3A%20whatsapp%20social%20and%20advanced%20form%20builder%20with%20easy%20lead%20collection
item.description: The FormFlow: WhatsApp Social and Advanced Form Builder with Easy Lead Collection WordPress plugin before 2.12.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
